mapper.insert: insert into history(history_id, user_id, comic_id, detail_id, lastreadtime, status) values (#{historyId},#{userId},#{comicId},#{detailId},#{lastReadTime},#{status})
mapper.select: select history_id AS historyId, history.user_id, username, history.comic_id, comicname, history.detail_id, chaptername, lastreadtime, history.status from history,comic,user,detail where history.comic_id = comic.comic_id = detail.comic_id and history.detail_id = detail.detail_id and user.user_id = history.user_id and history.user_id=#{userId}
